description:
exp/types: filling in more blanks

- implemented built-in complex()
- implemented missing expression switch checks

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=13a4979ed5cb ***

exp/types: filling in more blanks

- implemented built-in complex()
- implemented missing expression switch checks

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6920046

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/6920046/diff/2002/src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go
File src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6920046/diff/2002/src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go#newcode452
src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go:452: // If we have a constant integer case value, it must appear
On 2012/12/11 17:43:27, rsc wrote:
> 6g rejects duplicate floats too:
> Sadly it does not reject duplicate complex values.
> http://play.golang.org/p/ErvgHaRWuL

ACK.

It also rejects duplicate strings - but not duplicate bools.  ( http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=4524 )

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/6920046/diff/2002/src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go
File src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6920046/diff/2002/src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go#newcode452
src/pkg/exp/types/stmt.go:452: // If we have a constant integer case value, it must appear
6g rejects duplicate floats too:
Sadly it does not reject duplicate complex values.
http://play.golang.org/p/ErvgHaRWuL

subject: code review 6920046: exp/types: filling in more blanks
